Write-Up Text: People in Australia are discussing the upcoming Federal Budget and social media has been abuzz with their opinions. Most of the conversations revolve around the JobSeeker payment with politicians business leaders academics and community advocates urging the Prime Minister to increase the payment. Meanwhile workers from Latrobe Valley in Victoria and Collie in Western Australia are demanding a National Energy Transition Authority's inclusion to ensure that no worker or community gets left during an energy transition to achieve net-zero emissions. National Parks' funding boost has also been approved as their current status has left them falling apart.
